body:
Hello there I am Phil!

I went this year to Italy and went to the city Rome.
I visited many builds and other things!

I have here a photo about me in the Colosseum.
 

Also I went to the Lago di Bracciano with a beautiful skyline and sunset.
 

I hope you enjoy! :D


Further you also can share some photo's about yours!


Sry but I can't upload the 'real' photo's so you have to copy it

title: Holiday foto's '15/16
